verbs.description: [ARG1: The Trump administration] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: currently] [ARG2: in talks for a potential summit between the United States and Russia] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a Wall Street Journal report Friday night] .
The Trump administration is currently in talks for a potential summit between the United States and Russia , [V: according] to a Wall Street Journal report Friday night .
